title: 820-2950 kernel panic after replacing c9560
message: I know these boards have issue with c9560 however even after replacing with a bigger one. I am still getting kernel panic. measures 1.3v Initially when i touch the probe though i can see for like a split second it reads 3.3v?

title: 820-2950 kernel panic after replacing c9560
message:
I hope you didn't use hot air.
That cap is very easy to remove lifting pads one by one, just soldering iron...
Using hot air you can make more damage...

If you really used a quality cap (low ESR), now reflow GMUX.

title: 820-2950 kernel panic after replacing c9560
message: legend. now booting. looks like it is working now. gmux reflow solved issue.
